action.name: Copy Directory Tree
action.command: bash -c 'kdialog --passivepopup "⚠️ Constructing tree..." 2 && tree -a "%f" | xclip -sel clip && kdialog --passivepopup "✅ Directory tree copied to clipboard!" 2'

action.name: .ZIP This Directory
action.command: bash -c ' DIR="%f" && ZIP_NAME="$(basename "$DIR").zip" && ZIP_PATH="$(dirname "$DIR")/$ZIP_NAME" && 7z a -tzip -mx=9 "$ZIP_PATH" "$DIR" 2>/dev/null && kdialog --title "✅ ZIP Complete" --passivepopup "Created: $ZIP_NAME\nLocation: $(dirname "$DIR" | sed "s|$HOME|~|")" 10 '

action.name: Copy Path
action.command: bash -c 'echo -n "%F" | xclip -sel clip && kdialog --title "✅ Copied!" --passivepopup "$(echo "%F" | wc -w) paths copied" 3'

action.name: Execute Bash
action.command: xfce4-terminal -e "bash -c 'if [[ \"%f\" == *.sh ]]; then bash \"%f\"; elif [[ \"%f\" == *.py ]]; then python3 \"%f\"; fi; read -p \"Press [Enter] to close...\"'"

action.name: Execute Python
action.command: xfce4-terminal -e "bash -c 'if [[ \"%f\" == *.sh ]]; then bash \"%f\"; elif [[ \"%f\" == *.py ]]; then python3 \"%f\"; fi; read -p \"Press [Enter] to close...\"'"

action.name: Make Executable
action.command: bash -c 'if [ ! -x "%f" ]; then chmod +x "%f" && kdialog --passivepopup "Made executable: %f" 3; fi'

action.name: Secure Erase File
action.command:
bash -c ' TARGET="%f"
# Verify we have a regular file [ -f "$TARGET" ] || { zenity --error --text="Not a valid file: $TARGET" exit 1 }
# Get confirmation zenity --question \ --title="Secure Erase" \ --text="Permanently destroy ${TARGET##*/}?" \ --ok-label="DESTROY" \ --cancel-label="Cancel" || exit 0
# Execute with proper error handling if sudo shred -vz -n1 "$TARGET" && sudo rm -f "$TARGET"; then exit 0 else zenity --error --text="Failed to erase $TARGET" exit 1 fi '

action.name: Secure Erase Directory
action.command:
bash -c ' TARGET="%f" BASENAME=$(basename "$TARGET") TMP_DIR="/tmp/secure_erase_$$"
# Zenity confirmation (mandatory safety check) zenity --question --title="Secure Erase" \ --text="Permanently erase $BASENAME?\n\nThis cannot be undone!" \ --width=300 \ --ok-label="ERASE" \ --cancel-label="Cancel" || exit 1
mkdir -p "$TMP_DIR" TMP_FILE="$TMP_DIR/${BASENAME}_$(date +%s).tar"
if [ -f "$TARGET" ]; then # File handling (3-pass shred) sudo tar -cf "$TMP_FILE" "$TARGET" && \ sudo shred -n 3 -z -u "$TMP_FILE" && \ sudo rm -f "$TARGET"
elif [ -d "$TARGET" ]; then # Directory handling (7-pass shred) sudo tar -cf "$TMP_FILE" -C "$(dirname "$TARGET")" "$(basename "$TARGET")" && \ sudo shred -n 7 -z -u "$TMP_FILE" && \ sudo rm -rf "$TARGET" fi
rm -rf "$TMP_DIR" '
